content:
I don't have personal experience, but i can suggest some places where you can find information on local art and culture in paperback:

1) local museums and galleries: these institutions often showcase the works of local artists and provide information about the cultural heritage of the area.

2) local libraries: many libraries have special collections or events dedicated to the arts and culture of the community.

3) community centers: these centers often host cultural events, art exhibits, and workshops.

4) local festivals and events: attending festivals and events in the area can give you a glimpse into the local culture and art scene.

5) online resources: check out websites, blogs, and social media pages dedicated to local art and culture in paperback.
